Use the provided learning objectives, active learning components, scaffolding layers (1: Foundation, 2: Components, 3: Implementation, 4: Integration), and flashcard schema. Incorporate: Prior TLS handshake knowledge; Standards (OWASP WSTG-CONF-05, ASVS V14, NIST SP 800-52, CAB Forum BRs, PCI DSS); Tools (OpenSSL s_client, testssl.sh, sslyze, Qualys SSL Labs); Vulns (revocation gaps, weak algos, hostname mismatch); Misconceptions (self-signed always bad, browsers always CRL); Big picture (MitM prevention, config vulns in pentesters). Generate 50 flashcards following the schema exactly. Balance Bloom's levels (8-10 per level). Use distractor protocol strictly. Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcard objects. Ensure content is precise, educational, and pentest-focused.
